reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: WOMEN: Work Opportunities and More Empowerment Now

description.narrative: EFE-Egypt proposes to empower 275 vulnerable young women in Egypt through skills trainings and jobs.Concretely this 12-month project will:1. Facilitate the access of 75 women graduates from Cairo and Giza to employment through a Job Placement Training Prog ramme (JPTP) programme2. Provide capacity building and skills development for 200 undergraduate women from three governorates in Lower Egypt through a Career Directions (CD) programmeAt the end of the project 270 young women will have improved their skills (90 JPTP and 180 CD beneficiaries) while 60 will have found employment allowing them to indirectly benefit 281 family members (based on Egypt?s average household size of 4.2 people).

Provide capacity building and skills development for 200 undergraduate women from three governorates in Lower Egypt through a Career Directions (CD) programmeAt the end of the project 270 young women will have improved their skills (90 JPTP and 180 CD beneficiaries) while 60 will have found employment allowing them to indirectly benefit 281 family members (based on Egypt?s average household size of 4.2 people).

tag.narrative: Generating jobs, livelihood opportunities and well-being in a developing country is the main prio rity area in this activity
Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is a secondary priority area in this activity
